generic.heading: Something went wrong
generic.body: Sorry, we are unable to display the page right now.

403.heading: You don't have permission to view this page
403.body: You can see the content of the page if you log in and have sufficient access rights
403.body2: Your supervisor or the administrator of your office can request access rights for you from Varaamo's customer service.

404.heading: Page not found
404.body: Please check that the page address is spelled correctly. We may have also deleted or moved the page.

500.heading: Something unexpected happened
500.body: Sorry, we are unable to display the page right now.

503.heading: We'll be right back!
503.body: We're updating the Varaamo service. Thank you for your patience!

search: Error occurred when searching for spaces. Please try again!

deactivatedAccount.heading: Your User ID is not valid.
deactivatedAccount.subHeadingA: Please contact support via email at
deactivatedAccount.subHeadingB: or via the Contact us form.

api.CHANGES_NOT_ALLOWED: You cannot make changes to the booking.
api.RESERVATION_UNIT_MAX_NUMBER_OF_RESERVATI: You have exceeded the maximum number of bookings.
api.RESERVATION_UNIT_IN_OPEN_ROUND: You can make a seasonal booking application for this item.
api.RESERVATION_UNIT_IS_NOT_OPEN: The item is closed at the moment.
api.RESERVATION_UNIT_TYPE_IS_SEASON: You can only make a seasonal booking application for this item.

validation.APPLICATION_ADULT_RESERVEE_REQUIRED: The applicant must be 18 years old.
validation.APPLICATION_SECTION_SUITABLE_TIME_RANGES: The desired time is too short.
validation.CANCELLATION_TIME_PAST: Cancellation time is in the past
validation.RESERVATION_UNIT_ADULT_RESERVEE_REQUIRED: The person making the reservation must be 18 years old
validation.RESERVATION_UNIT_MAX_DURATION_EXCEEDED: The booking time is too long.
validation.RESERVATION_UNIT_MAX_NUMBER_OF_RESERVATI: You have the maximum number of bookings for this space.
validation.USER_NOT_INTERNAL_USER: Making a booking is not allowed.
